channel.title: Registration Now Open for GCOG
channel.description:
Registration has just opened for our free online ttrpg event-- Gauntlet Community Open Gaming. It's happening June 24-27th. Please reshare and retweet https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html
There's a manual approval process after you first sign up on the site, so it can be a little bit between registering and being able to sign up for games. I'm trying to stay keep on top of that today.

item.title: Registration Now Open for GCOG
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

Registration has just opened for our free online ttrpg event-- Gauntlet Community Open Gaming. It’s happening June 24-27th. Please reshare and retweet
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info

THE GAUNTLET

Gauntlet Community Open Gaming

GAUNTLET COMMUNITY OPEN GAMING The Gauntlet Community is proud to present a free weekend of open online gaming, taking place Thursday, June 24th through Sunday, June 27th . Gauntlet Community Open...

There’s a manual approval process after you first sign up on the site, so it can be a little bit between registering and being able to sign up for games. I’m trying to stay keep on top of that today.
